articles.author: Mischa Dijkstra
articles.title: Scientists solve 'enigma' of pygmy right whales' feeding habits - Phys.org
articles.description: Researchers have shown from stable isotope ratios in the baleen of pygmy right whales that this species of baleen whales remains in waters off southern Australia year-round and feeds on Australian krill and copepods. Unlike larger relatives, they don't make s…
